about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an action-packed zombie survival game inspired by beloved round-based zombie classics! Experience intense, round-based combat against hordes of the undead as you strategically conquer maps, upgrade your gear, and fight back against the ever-growing threat.

Explore multiple detailed maps, use wall weapons and perks, and build your arsenal with various attachments to withstand the onslaught. Utilize automatic turrets to defend your position or call in air support, such as the A10 strike or assistance from a combat helicopter. Upgrade at the machine to secure valuable advantages.

To maintain the core gameplay, there are no items, except skins, that can be unlocked globally and provide any pre-match benefits. This ensures that every match is challenging, with no player gaining advantages from higher levels.

Key Features:

  • Multiple Small Maps: Each map offers unique challenges and environments.

  • Wall Weapons and Perks: Purchase weapons directly from the wall and unlock powerful abilities to maximize your chances of survival.

  • Attachment System: Customize your weapons with various attachments to suit your playstyle.

  • Automatic Turrets: Deploy AI-controlled defense turrets to fend off zombie hordes.

  • Air Support: Call in devastating airstrikes or a combat helicopter to help in dire situations.

  • Upgrade Machine: Improve your weapons and gear to become stronger and more resilient.

  • Transit Mode with Train: Travel between different map sections via train and face new challenges.

  • Global Skins: Show off your unique weapons with a variety of skins. Skins are the only component that can be unlocked and applied across matches.

  • Split-Screen: Fully supports up to 4-player split-screen, a must-have feature for co-op games.

  • Online Co-op: Cross-platform multiplayer mode to team up with friends and take on the zombie hordes together.

Prepare yourself for an intense survival adventure where strategy and speed will decide life or death!
